questions.question: Hi, Lion! Do you want to sing ____ with me?
questions.answer: I sure do! Let's do it!

questions.question: If you give me a chance,
It's a shot in the dark
Know with all of your heart,
When I am with you,
questions.answer: THERE'S NO PLACE I'D RATHER BE

questions.question: You used to call me on my cell phone,
questions.answer: LATE NIGHT WHEN YOU NEED MY LOVE

questions.question: I know when that hotline bling
questions.answer: THAT CAN ONLY MEAN ONE THING

questions.question: Is it too late now to say sorry
questions.answer: CAUSE I'M MISSING MORE THAN JUST YOUR BODY

questions.question: Yeah I know that let you down
questions.answer: IS IT TOO LATE TO SAY SORRY NOW!

questions.question: And it's new,
questions.answer: THE SHAPE OF YOUR BODY, IT'S BLUE

questions.question: It's a cruel summer
questions.answer: IT'S COOL, THAT'S WHAT I TELL EM NO RULES

questions.question: Cheers to the one that we got
questions.answer: CHEERS TO THE WISH YOU WERE HERE, YOU WERE NOT
